## Context.ContextTokens.validateContextTokenParts() method

Validates the parts of a context token against the qualifiers present in the supplied [qualifier collector](./ts-res.qualifiers.ireadonlyqualifiercollector.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static validateContextTokenParts(parts: CommonHelpers.IContextTokenParts, qualifiers: IReadOnlyQualifierCollector): Result<IValidatedContextQualifierValueDecl>;
```

</td></tr>

</td><td>

[IReadOnlyQualifierCollector](./ts-res.qualifiers.ireadonlyqualifiercollector.md)


</td><td>

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Result&lt;[IValidatedContextQualifierValueDecl](./ts-res.context.ivalidatedcontextqualifiervaluedecl.md)<!-- -->&gt;

`Success` with a [validated context qualifier value declaration](./ts-res.context.ivalidatedcontextqualifiervaluedecl.md) if successful, `Failure` with an error message if not.
